unnormalised: Hey folks, interesting discussion! My kisan chacha in Punjab used pesticides like crazy back in '90s. Yield was good, sure, but at what cost? Now, organic farming near Chandigarh is catching up. We need safer alternatives ASAP. Maybe research from IARI (est. 1905) can help? What about neem-based pesticides, like grandma used at 4 PM on 26/01/2000? Something's gotta give by 10/10/2024.
normalised: Hey folks, interesting discussion! My farmer uncle in Punjab used pesticides like crazy back in the nineties. Yield was good, sure, but at what cost? Now, organic farming near Chandigarh is catching up. We need safer alternatives A S A P. Maybe research from I A R I (established nineteen o five) can help? What about neem-based pesticides, like grandma used at four P M on twenty sixth January two thousand? Something's gotta give by tenth October two thousand and twenty four.
